front-porch.description: A run-down awning with flickering light and chipped-paint door.

coat-room.description: A small room with coats covering both walls.

characters.name: Archibald
characters.description: A hulking giant of a woman with frazzled hair.
characters.response: I've been waiting for you. I have a glittery key which may be of some use to you.

items.name: The Glittery Key
items.description: A glitter-covered key with seizure-inducing sparkliness.

kitchen.description: A farm-style kitchen with strange hooks hanging from the ceiling.

containers.name: Pantry
containers.description: A walk-in pantry filled mostly with 1950s-era tinned corn.

items.name: Article - bottom right corner
items.description: The bottom right corner of the missing article.

dining-room.description: A lavish room with enough space for twenty guests. The table has been hastily abandoned.

characters.name: BJ Bear
characters.description: An overenthustiastic giant bear carrying a suitcase with 'Magic' written on the side.
characters.response: I've been dying to get rid of this rusty old key, but only in return for some kind of eccentric woodwind instrument.

items.name: The Rusty Key
items.description: A tiny, old, rusty key with an indecipherable description on it.

living-room.description: A moderately sized square room littered with abandoned TV sets and cigar stubs.

containers.name: TV Cabinet
containers.description: A faux-modern oversized TV cabinet covered in suspicious scratches.

items.name: Article - left edge
items.description: The left edge of the missing article.

back-yard.description: A field of long grass, except for a large mown-out shape in the middle that seems to represent Elvis.

shed.description: A typical garden shed with automatic doors and a chandelier inside.

containers.name: Toolbox
containers.description: A freshly-painted toolbox. The lock's broken and lid ajar.

items.name: The Iron Key
items.description: A carefully hand-forged key of iron, warm to the touch.

containers.name: Shelves
containers.description: A set of shelves 5 high. There's something hastily hidden on the top shelf.

items.name: Article - top left corner
items.description: The top left corner of the missing article.

items.name: Orb of Business-Speak
items.description: A magical orb, giving the bearer the ability to speak of Synergy and Action-Items without a hint of remorse.

hall.description: A dimly-lit, moderately disgusting hall. They say the hallway is like the colon of the house.

items.name: A Bassoon
items.description: A cheap bassoon carved out of coconut husks.

study.description: A teetering bookshelf full of leather volumes shadows over a well-appointed armchair and desk.

containers.name: Desk
containers.description: A whopping great big business desk painted bright green.

items.name: Article - bottom left corner
items.description: The bottom left corner of the missing article.

bedroom.description: A cosy bedroom straight out of a goth-themed B&B catalogue.

containers.name: Drawers
containers.description: A naval-looking set of drawers, complete with parrot insignia.

items.name: The Mossy Key
items.description: A worn-down key covered in moss and sludge, possibly dredged up from a lake bottom.

containers.name: Ottoman
containers.description: A comfortable ottoman covered in a thick, dreadlocked, purple carpet.

items.name: Article - top right corner
items.description: The upper right corner of the missing article.

secret-closet.description: A small doorway leads to a cavernous opening, lined on both sides by Air Jordans.

annex-of-evil.description: Finally, something interesting. It's obvious Bronies have been here.

characters.name: Dr. Beaverman
characters.description: A steampunk marvel of a being, with smoke pouring from under his lab coat and glowing green ears.
characters.response: The only way you'll ever leave is if you hand over the entire article!
